notesStmt.note: A reissue, with added general title page and preliminaries, of "The Athenian babler", London, 1627; "Jacob and Esau", London, 1626; "The arraignment of the Arrian", London, 1626; "Natures overthrow and deaths triumph", London, 1626; and "Moses and Aaron", London, 1626.
Reproduction of the original in the Yale University. Library.
